resources.string: Or click here to go back

Audio files are managed by MediaPlayer you can Play/Pause a file or Skip Backward/Forward by pushing the suitable button.
MediaPlayer takes the appropriate playlist that the user picked through The Available Playlists List and then starts the playback. 

Note: 
Ideally playlists are pre-created online and MediaPlayer requires Internet Access through the manifest in order to play them. 
Requires that developer has previous experience with MediaPlayer class as well as providing access through the AndroidManifest.
